  • Method Details

    • signup

      public void signup(int userId, String password, String role) throws RoleNotFoundException, UserIdAlreadyInUseException
      Handles the user signup process.
      Specified by:
      signup in interface UserInterface
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the new user.
      password - The password for the new user.
      role - The role assigned to the new user (e.g., student, professor).
      Throws:
      RoleNotFoundException - If the provided role is not valid.
      UserIdAlreadyInUseException - If the user ID is already in use.

    • login

      public void login(int userId, String password) throws UserNotFoundException, CourseNotAddedException, CourseNotFoundException, StudentNotApprovedException, StudentNotFoundException, ProfessorNotAddedException
      Handles the user login process.
      Specified by:
      login in interface UserInterface
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user attempting to log in.
      password - The password for the user.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - If the user with the specified ID is not found.
      CourseNotAddedException - If an error occurs while adding a course (not directly related to login but included in the method signature).
      CourseNotFoundException - If the specified course is not found (not directly related to login but included in the method signature).
      StudentNotApprovedException - If the student is not approved (not directly related to login but included in the method signature).
      StudentNotFoundException - If the student with the specified ID is not found (not directly related to login but included in the method signature).
      ProfessorNotAddedException - If the professor is not added (not directly related to login but included in the method signature).
